short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 一款无与伦比的阿里云DataWorks搜表扩展，让您可以在Chrome Omnibox上直接搜表。
short.en_US: A extraordinary search tables chrome extension, let you search tables in Chrome omnibox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
开源地址 https://github.com/datafe/dataworks-search-tables-chrome-extension
只需于Chrome URL框上打 table+Tab键 (或table+空白键) 即可呼起使用。

1. 打开插件设定页，设定地域、AppGuid、表类型及 AK 信息 (可于此页面获取 https://ram.console.aliyun.com/manage/ak)
2. 于一般网页上，对浏览器 URL 框敲入 table+Tab键 (或table+空白键) 进行搜索
3. 点击链接打开表详情

ps: 空白页上无法进行搜索

如果只需要简易的关键字跳转至数据地图搜索，可参考此插件 https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%91%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E5%9C%B0%E5%9B%BE%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2/jepgnngepfkgbnmiojimhengljiofeee?hl=en
long.en_US:
Open Source: https://github.com/datafe/dataworks-search-tables-chrome-extension
Only you type table and tab key (or table and space key) in chrome URL bar.

1. Open extension option page and setting region, app guid, table type and AK
2. typing tab key (or table and space key) in chrome URL bar
3. click search result and open table details

ps: emtpy tab cannot invoke this extension

If you only want simple passing keyword into DataMap website, you can install this extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/%E9%98%BF%E9%87%8C%E4%BA%91%E6%95%B0%E6%8D%AE%E5%9C%B0%E5%9B%BE%E6%90%9C%E7%B4%A2/jepgnngepfkgbnmiojimhengljiofeee?hl=en
